short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes tabs after a specified time, and stores their URLs to reopen later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XTabs automatically closes inactive browser tabs after a time limit you set, helping you stay organized and keep your browser clutter-free. It can be customized to your workflow with both default and per-tab timers, and an easy way to exclude important tabs so they never close.

Features
	•	Auto-close timer: Set a global time limit (from minutes to months) for tabs to remain open.
	•	Per-tab custom timer: Assign different time limits to specific tabs.
	•	Exclude tabs: Mark any tab as excluded so it never closes automatically.
	•	History page: View and reopen recently closed tabs with details such as title, URL, and close time.
	•	Clean interface: Intuitive controls and animated slot-machine style timers.

Why Use XTabs?
	•	Declutter your browser: No more endless tabs left open for days or weeks.
	•	Boost productivity: Focus on what’s important, automatically closing stale or inactive tabs.
	•	Stay in control: Custom timers and exclusion settings give you the flexibility to tailor your browsing experience.

Try XTabs and enjoy a cleaner, faster, and more organized browsing experience!
